prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a segmented body and vibrant colors.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a caterpillar with unique spikes and a friendly face.
Generate a cute, small Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and has a unique evolution.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that has a mix of red and white colors with bug-like features.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that can camouflage against leaves, featuring bright red accents.
Design a Pokemon that has a soft body with a spiky head, perfect for young trainers.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves into a beautiful butterfly, starting as a tiny caterpillar.
